raw_definition: A framework or set of basic perspectives, methods, and pedagogy that seeks to identify, analyze, and transform those structural and cultural aspects of society that maintain the subordination and marginalization of People of Color
grammar_fix_definition: A framework or set of basic perspectives, methods, and pedagogy that seeks to identify, analyze, and transform those structural and cultural aspects of society that maintain the subordination and marginalization of People of Color
source (immediate): Solorzano, D. G. (1997). Images and words that wound: Critical race theory, racial stereotyping, and teacher education. Teacher education quarterly, 5-19.

raw_definition: fair treatment and meaningful involvement of all people regardless of race, color, national origin, or income with respect to the development, implementation, and enforcement of environmental laws, regulations, and policies.
grammar_fix_definition: The fair treatment and meaningful involvement of all people regardless of race, color, national origin, or income with respect to the development, implementation, and enforcement of environmental laws, regulations, and policies.
source (immediate): Bass, R. (1998). Evaluating environmental justice under the national environmental policy act. Environmental Impact Assessment Review, 18(1), 83-92.
notes: Added "The" at startl; Used by EPA: URL (https://www.gsa.gov/reference/civil-rights-programs/environmental-justice#:~:text=GSA%20and%20Environmental%20Justice,laws%2C%20regulations%2C%20and%20policies.), Acessed (2024-10-21), Updated (October 21 2024)

raw_definition: By affirmative action, I mean a program in which people who control access to important social resources offer preferential access to those resources for particular groups that they think need special treatment
grammar_fix_definition: When people who control access to important social resources offer preferential access to those resources for particular groups that they think need special treatment
source (immediate): Schuck, P. H. (2002). Affirmative action: Past, present, and future. Yale L. & Pol'y Rev., 20, 1.

raw_definition: methods of providing fire prevention, response, detection, control, extinguishment, and engineering.
grammar_fix_definition: Methods of providing fire prevention, response, detection, control, extinguishment, and engineering.
source (immediate): Occupational Safety and Health Administration (no date) 1915.509 - definitions applicable to this subpart., Occupational Safety and Health Administration. Available at: https://www.osha.gov/laws-regs/regulations/standardnumber/1915/1915.509 (Accessed: 23 October 2024).

raw_definition: Weather forecasts provide an estimate of the conditions we expect to experience in the near future and are based on statistical models of similar conditions from previous weather events.
grammar_fix_definition: Estimating the conditions we expect to experience in the near future, based on statistical models of similar conditions from previous weather events
source (immediate): National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration. (n.d.). Weather and atmosphere. https://www.noaa.gov/education/resource-collections/weather-atmosphere

raw_definition: Nutritional science examines how organisms consume and process foods and beverages for nourishment
grammar_fix_definition: Examines how organisms consume and process foods and beverages for nourishment
